input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product specification:
Sea Gull Lighting 61035-777 Metropolis One-Light Mini Pendant, Copper Revival Finish with Satin Etched Glass

Product keywords:
Shade Material: Etched glass.
Shade Color: Satin. 
Distressed: No.
Number of Lights: 1
Connection: Hardwired. 
Plug-In: No. 
Chain or Rod Length: 12".
10 feet of Wire
Requires One Medium A-Line 100-watt maximum bulb
Three Interconnecting 12-Inch stems Included
For Additional Decorative Chain Order: 9100-777
For Additional Stem Order: 9199-777
Canopy Included

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
61035-777 Finish: Copper Revival with a Satin Etched Glass Shade -Shade Material: Etched glass. -Shade Color: Satin. -Distressed: No. -Number of Lights: 1. -Connection: Hardwired. -Plug-In: No. -Chain or Rod Length: 12". It requires One Medium A-Line 100-watt maximum bulb.
Soft curves take on a sleek, hip attitude when paired with Copper Revival and Satin Etched Glass in this Metropolis Collection, One-Light Mini Pendant. The fixture includes Three Interconnecting 12-Inch Stems and 12 inches of Chain with 10 feet of Wire. The canopy is also Included. Additional Decorative Chains and Stems are available (Order: 9199-777) each Sold Separately.
input_text.Response B: Bring a touch of elegance to your home with the Sea Gull Lighting 61035-777 Metropolis One-Light Mini Pendant. This beautiful pendant features a copper revival finish with satin etched glass, adding a warm and inviting look to any room. The 10 feet of wire and three interconnecting 12-inch stems make it easy to install and perfect for any space. The shade material is etched glass and the shade color is satin. This pendant requires one medium A-line 100-watt maximum bulb and is hardwired. There is no plug-in or chain/rod length. The canopy is included. If you would like to purchase additional decorative chain, please order 9100-777. If you would like to purchase additional stem, please order 9199-777. Distressed: No.
